dcterms:description: The NPN-Cooking dataset consists of 65,816 training, 175 development, and 700 evaluation recipes, used for entity tracking tasks in the recipe domain.
dcterms:title: NPN-Cooking Dataset

dcterms:creator: Bhavana Dalvi Mishra
Lifu Huang
Niket Tandon
Wen-tau Yih
Peter Clark
dcterms:description: The ProPara dataset consists of 488 human-authored procedures with 81k annotations regarding changing states (existence and location) of entities in those paragraphs, used for entity tracking tasks in the open domain.
dcterms:title: ProPara Dataset
